relation: Referred to the committee on Children, Families and Persons with Disabilities
Hearing scheduled for 07/19/2011 from 10:30 AM-05:00 PM in Gardner Auditorium
Bill reported favorably by committee and referred to the House committee on Ways and Means
title: Actions for Bill H.1861
textBeforeTable: SECTION 2. Section 12(5) of Chapter 18B is amended by inserting at the end of the first sentence, "Said budget shall be consistent with caseload standards established by the Child Welfare League of America."  "ensure that no social worker will carry a caseload in excess of the standards set forth by the Child Welfare League of America and shall request the same in the Department's budget request to the General Court."  SECTION 1. Section 7(a) of Chapter 18B of the Massachusetts General Laws is hereby amended by removing the words "establish reasonable caseload rates and report the same to the General Court in the budget estimates of the Department" and inserting in its place the following:  Miscellaneous Bill History Bill Text Print Preview
